title: Leeds United: Ross McCormack agrees four-year deal
description: Leeds United forward Ross McCormack agrees a new and improved four-year contract at Elland Road.
content:
Ross McCormack has signed a new four-year contract with Leeds United.

The 27-year-old Scotland forward has scored four times in six appearances this season and had recently been

Since joining from Cardiff in 2010, the ex-Rangers, Doncaster and Motherwell frontman has hit 33 goals in 114 games.

"I'm delighted to sign a new contract. I always said I was happy and settled here," McCormack told the club website.
